name: 3 Blind Mice
description:
The 3 Blind Mice are hungry and they've heard there might be some snacks in the house! Head on over and have yourselves a feed!

Use a single control scheme to control all 3 mice, but you'll notice they might not go the way you expect! 

Use WASD or the Arrows to move

Get all 3 mice to the cheese . Collect cookies along the way! 

Art/Code:  rsvp asap

Music:  Cleyton Kauffman
